prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing birthday greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "funny card"
Style: âœ¨ Smart Style
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted


Message: "Happy birthday! I was going to make an age-related joke, but honestly, I'm just impressed you're still putting up with me after all this time. You deserve a medal... or at least a really big piece of cake. Hope your day is as awesome as you are!"

Reference: "artistic transformation"

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details





- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "birthday" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in a charming and whimsical caricature style, hand-drawn with colored pencils and a touch of soft watercolor wash. The features from the reference photo are comically exaggerated with a loving and playful hand, focusing on a signature smile or expressive eyes to capture the subject's personality. The linework is loose and expressive, filled with warm, vibrant colors that feel joyful and celebratory. The background is minimal, perhaps a soft, cheerful color wash, ensuring the funny and heartfelt portrait remains the star of the show, creating a truly personal and smile-inducing keepsake.

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a birthday card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in a charming and whimsical caricature style, hand-drawn with colored pencils and a touch of soft watercolor wash. The features from the reference photo are comically exaggerated with a loving and playful hand, focusing on a signature smile or expressive eyes to capture the subject's personality. The linework is loose and expressive, filled with warm, vibrant colors that feel joyful and celebratory. The background is minimal, perhaps a soft, cheerful color wash, ensuring the funny and heartfelt portrait remains the star of the show, creating a truly personal and smile-inducing keepsake.

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Happy birthday! I was going to make an age-related joke, but honestly, I'm just impressed you're still putting up with me after all this time. You deserve a medal... or at least a really big piece of cake. Hope your day is as awesome as you are!" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Style: in a charming and whimsical caricature style, hand-drawn with colored pencils and a touch of soft watercolor wash. The features from the reference photo are comically exaggerated with a loving and playful hand, focusing on a signature smile or expressive eyes to capture the subject's personality. The linework is loose and expressive, filled with warm, vibrant colors that feel joyful and celebratory. The background is minimal, perhaps a soft, cheerful color wash, ensuring the funny and heartfelt portrait remains the star of the show, creating a truly personal and smile-inducing keepsake.

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in a charming and whimsical caricature style, hand-drawn with colored pencils and a touch of soft watercolor wash. The features from the reference photo are comically exaggerated with a loving and playful hand, focusing on a signature smile or expressive eyes to capture the subject's personality. The linework is loose and expressive, filled with warm, vibrant colors that feel joyful and celebratory. The background is minimal, perhaps a soft, cheerful color wash, ensuring the funny and heartfelt portrait remains the star of the show, creating a truly personal and smile-inducing keepsake.

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a funny birthday greeting card, 9:16 ratio, in a charming and whimsical caricature style, hand-drawn with colored pencils and a touch of soft watercolor wash. The scene depicts two cartoon animals, a sloth and a monkey, wearing party hats and riding a unicycle through a sky filled with colorful confetti. The sloth, in front, has a mischievous grin and wide eyes, while the monkey behind it is ecstatic with its mouth open in a cheer and one arm raised in the air. A faint, glowing yellow streak follows the unicycle, suggesting movement. Below them, a stylized cartoon character, a young man in graduation attire (robe and lei), sits on a ledge, looking up at the animals with a wide, happy smile. The background features muted, classical-style buildings and greenery. The text 'Happy Birthday!' is prominently displayed in a playful, bold, brown font, positioned in the lower-middle section of the card, ensuring safe printing margins. The overall color palette is vibrant yet soft, with a dominant light blue sky, warm browns and grays for the animals, and bright accents for the confetti and lei. The mood is humorous, lighthearted, and celebratory.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a funny birthday greeting card, 9:16 ratio, continuing the charming and whimsical caricature style. The design subtly references the front cover with a single, stylized golden confetti piece arcing gently across the light blue background, reminiscent of the confetti and movement from the front. Below the confetti, a simplified, abstract pattern of soft, warm-toned shapes, like blurred brushstrokes of yellow and orange, creates a peaceful, celebratory conclusion without any text or characters. The overall mood is serene and subtly joyful, complementing the front cover's energetic humor.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior page of a funny birthday greeting card, 9:16 ratio, rendered in a charming and whimsical caricature style with colored pencils and soft watercolor washes. This page features a close-up, dynamic composition of the sloth and monkey on the unicycle, captured mid-air with the colorful confetti raining down around them. The sloth's comically exaggerated grumpy expression and the monkey's gleeful excitement are emphasized. The golden streak from the front cover is more pronounced here, swirling around the unicycle. The background is a soft, gradient wash of light blue, allowing the characters and confetti to pop. The style emphasizes expressive linework and joyful, vibrant colors, consistent with the front cover, creating a sense of fun and playful chaos that builds on the initial introduction.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior page of a funny birthday greeting card, 9:16 ratio, in a charming and whimsical caricature style with colored pencils and soft watercolor washes. The main focus is the birthday message text: \"Happy birthday! I was going to make an age-related joke, but honestly, I'm just impressed you're still putting up with me after all this time. You deserve a medal... or at least a really big piece of cake. Hope your day is as awesome as you are!\". The text is presented in the same playful, bold, brown font as the front cover. The message is artfully integrated into an abstract, celebratory design. This design features a large, whimsical slice of cake with glowing candles, creatively incorporated behind and around the text. Scattered confetti and a subtle, swirling golden effect, similar to the streak on the front, surround the cake and text, tying into the overall narrative. The background is a soft, light blue wash, ensuring the message and illustrative elements are clear and impactful, conveying the humorous and heartfelt tone."
}
```
generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a birthday greeting card with a minimalist, clean, and whimsical artistic style. The background is a very pale, almost white-blue. In the lower left quadrant, a stylized, flat illustration of a unicycle is depicted lying on its side. The unicycle has a black wheel with thin spokes and a black frame extending to a simple, curved seat. Above and to the right of the unicycle, a subtle trail of abstract, scattered elements suggests movement or a gentle gust of wind. This trail consists of a few soft, blurred golden specks that blend into the background, interspersed with a few small, solid, oval shapes in bright orange and light blue. These colorful dots are scattered upwards and to the right, creating a sense of airy playfulness. There is no text on this back cover, and no space is reserved for a QR code, allowing the simple, evocative imagery to provide a quiet, artistic conclusion to the card's visual narrative. The overall impression is one of lightheartedness and subtle charm, harmonizing with a humorous and lighthearted tone.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a birthday card with a whimsical, hand-drawn illustration in colored pencil and watercolor wash. The scene features a prominent, richly textured golden medal, intricately detailed with a swirling, spiral design. A vibrant rainbow-colored ribbon is attached to the medal, drapes upwards and then flows downwards in a sinuous, winding path that curves across the composition. The background is a soft, pale blue with a subtle paper-like texture, creating a bright and cheerful, yet minimalist, setting. The artwork evokes a sense of playful celebration and accomplishment, aligning with a funny and lighthearted tone. The style is consistent with a charming caricature, emphasizing expressive lines and warm, joyful colors, with the medal and rainbow as the sole artistic elements.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
Right interior page of a birthday greeting card designed for message space with a whimsical and colorful border of dripping birthday candles and swirling party streamers in vibrant shades of orange, yellow, green, purple, and blue. The background is a light, serene blue. The text "Happy Birthday!" is prominently displayed at the top in a playful, dark purple font. Below this, the main message is presented in a clear, legible sans-serif font, also in dark purple, occupying the central area. The decorative elements frame the text, creating a visual celebration that complements the humorous and lighthearted tone of the message, with no specific artistic style mentioned for the border beyond its playful nature. The overall composition is flat 2D artwork suitable for printing.

Here's a detailed prompt that could have been used to create this image:

"Flat 2D artwork for a birthday greeting card interior, 9:16 aspect ratio. The background is a soft, light blue. Dominating the left and right edges of the page is a whimsical, artistic border composed of stylized, dripping birthday candles in vibrant, saturated colors: orange, yellow, lime green, deep purple, and aqua blue. These candles are depicted with thick, melted wax drips, and each has a bright, warm flame. Intertwined with the candles are playful, swirling party streamers and ribbons in coordinating bright colors, including red, orange, yellow, blue, and purple. Some streamers are depicted as long, flowing ribbons, while others are depicted as coiled party blowers. These decorative elements fill the left and right sides of the card, curving inwards and creating a natural framing for the central text.

Positioned in the upper central area of the card, with safe margins from the top edge, is the greeting text: 'Happy Birthday!' This text is rendered in a bold, playful, sans-serif font with a dark purple outline and fills, creating a strong visual anchor.

Below the 'Happy Birthday!' greeting, occupying the majority of the central space, is the main message text: 'I was going to make an age-related joke, but honestly, I'm just impressed you're still putting up with me after all this time. You deserve a medal... or at least a really big piece of cake. Hope your day is as awesome as you are!' This text is presented in a clear, readable, dark purple, sans-serif font, with generous line spacing to accommodate potential handwritten messages. The text is carefully placed within the central area, ensuring it is well-separated from the ornate borders and remains at least 10% away from the top and bottom edges.

The overall style is cheerful, illustrative, and cartoon-like, with a focus on bright, contrasting colors and playful shapes that convey a humorous and lighthearted tone. The linework is clean and defined, with a slight cartoonish exaggeration in the candle drips and streamer shapes. The image should evoke a sense of joyful celebration, with the decorative elements enhancing, rather than overwhelming, the message space. Ensure the entire design adheres to a full-bleed background, with no white borders, and all key elements like text and the main decorative motifs are kept away from the absolute edges to account for printing. The artistic style is consistent with a charming and whimsical caricature, hand-drawn with colored pencils and a touch of soft watercolor wash, focusing on joyful and celebratory colors and loose, expressive linework.

The visual narrative continues from the front cover, maintaining a cohesive color palette and playful artistic style. The emphasis is on creating a visually engaging and fun space for the birthday message."
